text:
Hello, I'm trying to replace HelpCrunch chat with HubSpot's Chat to allow our users to chat with support staff.
HelpCrunch allows us to programatically attach certain metadata like username, user_id, email, customer_type, etc, which is immediately available within the chat's info for our support team to see.
Is this possible with HubSpot?

Can anyone provide me links that explain HubSpot protocol for backup of portals, like often portals with content/themes/templates/modules/files are backed up and what is recovery plan if a portal goes down?
HI Chris, you can find answers to that here <https://www.HubSpot.com/reliability>
Is related_blog_posts not working at the moment? It was working for me up until about 3 hours ago and now it's not returning any results. Thanks.
Add your questions in this thread :slightly_smiling_face:
